allow: Bash(echo "Coolify deployment tracking..." for i in {1..12})
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker exec coolify php artisan config:cache && docker exec coolify php artisan queue:restart")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker ps --filter name=admin- --format ''{{.ID}} | Created: {{.CreatedAt}} | Status: {{.Status}}''")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker exec coolify php artisan queue:restart")

Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "echo ''Admin:'' && docker ps --filter name=admin- --format ''{{.ID}} | {{.CreatedAt}}'' && echo ''API:'' && docker ps --filter name=api- --format ''{{.ID}} | {{.CreatedAt}}''")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker restart 4827cc1601ad && echo ''API container restarting...''")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker restart 909cbcbea9cd && echo ''Admin container restarting...''")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker exec coolify php artisan queue:restart && echo ''✅ Coolify queue restarted''")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker exec coolify php artisan queue:restart && echo ''✅ Queue restarted''")
Bash(do echo "[$i/8] Checking for new container...")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker restart c1d57b01ba89 && echo ''✅ Admin container restarting...''")
Bash(do echo "[$i/10] Waiting for new deployment...")
Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker logs d2539ca84654 2>&1 | tail -50 | grep -i ''2fa\|verify\|bad\|400''")

Bash(ssh root@95.217.219.4 "docker exec -i mssql /opt/mssql-tools/bin/sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P ''YourStrong@Passw0rd'' -d StockerMasterDb -Q ""UPDATE MasterUsers SET TwoFactorFailedAttempts = 0, TwoFactorLockoutEndAt = NULL WHERE Email = ''admin@stoocker.app''; SELECT TwoFactorFailedAttempts, TwoFactorLockoutEndAt FROM MasterUsers WHERE Email = ''admin@stoocker.app'';""")
